First Meeting: You aren't trying to kill me?
Oh... righ... I was supposed to do that today.
I have too much to do. I'll try to get to that tomorrow.
This hallway is blocked off by this Wall of Fire and I can't get the Fire Suppression System working.
Have you tried turning it off and on again?
I see you have some IT experience.
But no. The power switch is on the other end of this hall. If you find yourself over there, I would be mighty appreciative if you did that for me.
I'll see what I can do.
Repeatable
There's a large power switch on the other end of this hallway. If you see it, try turning it off and then on again for me.
After fixing
Thanks for dealing with those Walls of Fire. I'll just be packing up and then heading out.
3rd floor greeting
Oh... hi. You're the one that helped me get that firewall fixed back on the first floor, right?
I am. Now I'm looking for the head of this department, is this his office?
Yes, but he hasn't been here since the AC in here broke.
Have you tried turning it off and on again?
Yes, but that didn't work. I think somebody intentionally sabatoged it.
If you're trying to get to Frank you'll need this.
Repeatable
I do have orders to kill you, but I'll get to that once this AC is fixed.
In front of Frank
Oh... Hi there. Frank, the Head of Accounting is just through this door. I was about to go in there and tell him that I can't fix the AC in his office.
Partially because it was intentionally sabatoged, and partially because I do IT and have no idea how to fix an AC unit.
Why are you just waiting outside the door?
Frank doesn't usually take bad news very well. He has been known to turn people who fail him into mindless ice golems.
Do you want to go first? Who knows, maybe you'll kill him and I won't have to deal with this.
Repeatable
You go first... Frank scares me.
